Class.Name: NSOpenPanel
Class.Description: A panel that prompts the user to select a file to open.

InstanceProperties.Name: canChooseFiles
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean that indicates whether the user can choose files in the panel.

InstanceProperties.Name: canChooseDirectories
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean that indicates whether the user can choose directories in the panel.

InstanceProperties.Name: resolvesAliases
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean that indicates whether the panel resolves aliases.

InstanceProperties.Name: allowsMultipleSelection
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean that indicates whether the user may select multiple files and directories.

InstanceProperties.Name: accessoryViewDisclosed
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the panel's accessory view is visible.

InstanceProperties.Name: URLs
InstanceProperties.Description: An array of URLs, each of which contains the fully specified location of a selected file or directory.

InstanceProperties.Name: canDownloadUbiquitousContents
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates how the panel responds to iCloud documents that aren't fully downloaded locally.

InstanceProperties.Name: canResolveUbiquitousConflicts
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates how the panel responds to iCloud documents that have conflicting versions.

TypeMethods.Name: openPanel
TypeMethods.Description: Creates a new Open panel and initializes it with a default configuration.
